articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Remodeled Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Remodeled Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, together with Ri Sol Ju, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory which has turned into a model and standard for the nation's cosmetics factories.
					 After seeing the mosaic of leader Kim Jong Il titled "To Provide Our People with Better Cosmetics," respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un went round the newly arranged room for the education in the revolutionary history and room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 Looking carefully at each picture of Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the factory in August 2003, he said that Kim Jong Il would be very glad to see the factory renovated finely.
					
					 All the places of the factory are associated with the love for the people by Kim Jong Il who made efforts to provide them with more highly civilized living conditions, Kim Jong Un said, calling upon the officials and employees of the factory to produce more cosmetics of good quality with world competitive power and provide the people with them, always remembering on-the-spot instructions given by Kim Jong Il on the day.
					
					 He went round the integrated production control room, cosmetics, soap and cosmetics vessel shops, design room, cosmetics institute, cosmetics analytical laboratory, sci-tech learning space, sample room and other places of the factory to learn in detail about the renovation, production, research and quality of goods.
					
					 He was very pleased, saying the variety of cosmetics produced by the factory are numerous and qualitative, and that not only pattern of their vessels but packing boxes are very nice. He said with pride that he was very pleasant to think about our women and people who would like after receiving world-level cosmetics produced at the factory which has been put on a modern, scientific and industrial basis, pointing out that it has come to have the dream of the women who want to be more beautiful be realized.
					
					 Noting that the districts for production, education and workers' living of the factory have been clearly distinct, all its buildings arranged into green and energy-saving ones and everything face-lifted radically, he said he felt good as the factory has been remodeled to be proud of in the world so that it would be flawless in the distant future, too.
					
					 He put forward the important tasks facing the factory and directly gave the tasks for modernizing the second-stage production process.
					
					 Expressing the expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the factory would make continued innovation and advance in the drive to provide the people with good quality cosmetics, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by An Jong Su, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Kim Yo Jong and Jo Yong Won, leading officials of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Appeal Made by AINDF Central Committee
articles.content:
Appeal Made by AINDF Central Committee
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front made public an appeal on Saturday to mark the first anniversary of the start of all-people resistance in south Korea which punished the Park Geun Hye group of traitors, according to the internet homepage Kuguk Jonson.
					 The appeal noted that south Koreans from all walks of life turned out in the candlelight action with surging anger at Park Geun Hye's hideous crimes.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her servants made last-ditch efforts to save themselves from crisis, crying out for "elimination of the reds", but the candlelight action got further intensified to bring traitor Park to the prison and declare the doom to the conservative group, it said, and went on:
					
					 More than hundred days have passed since the candlelight action made the regime change and the "government" for democratic reforms appeared in south Korea. However the people's desire for righteous new politics, society and life remains a dim dream.
					
					 It was natural for the "government of candlelight" to work for stop to the anti-north war exercises bringing the dark clouds of nuclear war to the Korean peninsula. But the present authorities are hell-bent on the joint military drills almost everyday, begging the U.S. to offer "extended nuclear deterrence" and introducing more nuclear assets.
					
					 Precious fruitions of the candlelight resistance have been mercilessly violated to cause serious damage to the social development and the remnants of the Park Geun Hye group and other conservative forces have revived to reverse the history. The present situation awakens all the people and calls for restart of the candlelight action.
					
					 The candlelight resistance has not yet ended but should be continued. This is the exclamation of all the people.
					
					 The present authorities can never be allowed to get hell-bent on sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the compatriots and drive the south-north relations to the extreme phase, following in the footsteps of the conservative regime although they took power thanks to the candlelight action.
					
					 The righteous new politics, society and life indicated by the candlelight are related to national reunification and the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators can never be mentioned without national reunification.
					
					 A single candlelight is small but the candlelight action of ten million people is tremendously strong.
					
					 The victory of the candlelight resistance is for our popular masses to continue the struggle for independence, democracy and reunification in the same fighting spirit as displayed to oust traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The appeal called upon all the people to hold candlelight of action higher so as to bring about righteous new politics, society and life without fail.

articles.title: Autumn Amateur Marathon 2017 Held
articles.content:
Autumn Amateur Marathon 2017 Held
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The 2017 Autumn Amateur Marathon took place in Pyongyang on Sunday.
					 More than 240 male and female runners from the DPRK, Netherlands, Sweden, the Czech Republic, UK and other countries competed in marathon, half marathon and 10km race and 5km race.
					
					 The runners who proved successful in the competitions were awarded certificates and souvenirs.

articles.title: Art Performance Successfully Given in Kanggye City
articles.content:
Art Performance Successfully Given in Kanggye City
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe of the DPRK gave their music and dance performances in Kanggye City, Jagang Province from October 18 to 29.
					 The performances were enjoyed by officials, working people and youth and students in the province.
					
					 Put on the stages were colorful numbers such as male solo and chorus "Song Dedicated to Mother Party", male trio and male chorus "Along One Road of Socialism" and dance "Dash toward Future".
					
					 The performers sang loudly of the faith and will of the people in Jagang Province to remain faithful to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and go along the road of the revolution to the last under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Female chorus and male chorus "We Will Never Forget" and narrative poem "Jagang Province, Let's Always Remember" made the audience yearn for the peerlessly great men.
					
					 "Jagang Province Is the One My Country Boasts of", "Ballad of Mountains of Gold" and other songs representing pride and optimism of the people in Jagang Province turned the theatre into dancing hall. 
					
					 The audience expressed their excitement after enjoying the performances.

articles.title: Meeting in Japan Demands Payment of Subsidies to Korean Schools
articles.content:
Meeting in Japan Demands Payment of Subsidies to Korean Schools
Tokyo, October 28 (KNS-KCNA) -- There took place a meeting in Tokyo of Japan on Oct. 25 demanding the resumption of payment of subsidies to Korean schools.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, teachers, students and graduates of the Korean High School, their parents, students of the Korean University and members of different organizations of Japan, thousands in all.
					
					 Speakers said they would not remain passive toward the hideous attempt of the Japanese regime seeking to disturb the national education, expressing their anger at the unjust judgments made by the Hiroshima District Court and the Tokyo District Court in trials concerning the payment of subsidies for Korean schools.
					
					 It is the due responsibility of Japan to support the national education of Koreans as the students of Korean schools are descendents of the Korean nationals who were taken to Japan under the harsh colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, they said.
					
					 Condemning the discrimination and suppression against the Korean schools instilling national pride into their students as the worst crime, they said that the Japanese authorities should feel ashamed about it and stop adding to its past crimes.
					
					 Referring to the illegality of the termination of payment of subsidies applied to the Korean schools only, they strongly urged the Japanese regime to resume the payment immediately.
					
					 They appealed to the students and teachers of the Korean schools, their parents and other Koreans and Japanese supporters to get firmly united, pool their efforts and carry on their struggle for the victory of justice.
					
					 An appeal was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stubborn Struggle against U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stubborn Struggle against U.S.
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- It is the fixed will of the Korean army and people to protect life and happiness by fighting it out against the enemies, Rodong Sinmun stresses in an article Sunday.
					 Concession and retreat in the struggle against the imperialists and class enemies may lead to death, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The tragic situation of Iraq and Libya showed how miserable were the aftermath of putting down arms by temptation and atrocious military threat and blackmail of the U.S.
					
					 The present reality, in which the U.S. aggression moves are getting evermore pronounced, requires bolstering up the self-reliant defence capability in quality and quantity. The struggle against the imperialists should depend on powerful military strength as it is accompanied by muscle-flexing.
					
					 The DPRK directed efforts to building up the military capability even in the most difficult period of Arduous March, Forced March to smash the imperialists' obstructive moves and defend its socialist system, and thus protected the destiny of the country and the nation and opened up a broad avenue to building a socialist power.
					
					 Now that the dark clouds of nuclear war against the DPRK is constantly hanging over on the Korean peninsula, it is the steadfast will of our Party and the DPRK government to defend the sovereignty and peace of the country and the dignity of the nation on the powerful self-reliant strength.
					
					 Quite right is the stand of the DPRK to further increase in quality and quantity the Juche-based defence capability guaranteeing happiness and prosperity of the people under the banner of the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force as long as there are the imperialists on the earth and their nuclear threats continue.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Warmongers of Increasing Tensions
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Warmongers of Increasing Tensions
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The puppet regime of south Korea let a U.S. B-1B fly over Seoul at a low altitude as a token of muscle-flexing against the DPRK. Meanwhile, warmongers of its army added fuel to tensions, staging a virtual missile launching drill in the East Sea of Korea. It again kicked up a missile alert drill in league with the U.S. and Japan in the waters off the Korean peninsula.
					 Leading newspapers of the DPRK in their commentaries Sunday term it deliberate acts to worsen the already tense situation of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The B-1B's low-altitude flight over Seoul was just a ridiculous move to calm down the ever-growing war-phobia in south Korea and irritate the DPRK.
					
					 Seized with an extreme illusion about the nuclear strategic assets of America, the puppet regime is frantically resorting to the moves for provoking a war against the north at its American master's beck and call. However, it only betrays their wretched plight as colonial lackeys.
					
					 Inviting a U.S. nuclear-capable bomber to the sky above a city of dense population not in wartime but in peacetime is just a stupid act peculiar to the puppet regime only.
					
					 The missile alert drill can be termed a prelude to the puppet forces' involvement in the U.S.-led missile defense system.
					
					 Minju Joson says the south Korean puppet regime is chiefly to blame for wrecking peace and stability of the Korean peninsula in league with outsiders and it is a pack of confrontation maniacs running wild to do harm to the compatriots in the north at any cost and impose a nuclear holocaust upon all Koreans.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Swiss bodies and a Belarusian personage issued statements on Oct. 21 and 23 to denounce the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement disclosed in detail that the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces conducted the largest-ever joint naval drills in waters off the Korean peninsula.
					
					 No threat can frighten socialist Korea and its people and if the U.S. imperialists start a war against the DPRK, they will face the merciless military counterattack from the Korean People's Army and the clan of criminals led by warmonger Trump will not escape the punishment of justice, the statement said.
					
					 The editor-in-chief of the Belarusian magazine Social Education branded the above-said joint exercises as a provocative and reckless act against the DPRK.
					
					 He censured the U.S. and its vassal forces for their nasty moves to stifle the DPRK through sanctions.

articles.title: U.S. Defense Secretary's S. Korea Visit Protested
articles.content:
U.S. Defense Secretary's S. Korea Visit Protested
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea on Oct. 27 conducted anti-U.S., anti-war actions with regard to the U.S. defense secretary's visit to south Korea, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification launched a demonstration outside the Chongwadae in denunciation of the moves for building up the U.S.-Japan-south Korea tripartite military alliance.
					
					 Demonstrators said that all the issues to be discussed in the annual security consultative meeting were to introduce south Korea into the U.S. strategy for domination of East Asia for increasing capability for preemptive attack on the north through building up missile defense system and military alliance.
					
					 Meanwhile, the "Measure Committee for Properly Retaking U.S. Military Base in Ryongsan" reportedly conducted a demonstration in the evening of that day to demand the return of the U.S. military base in Ryongsan.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Urges Probe into Truth of Kwangju Massacre
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Urges Probe into Truth of Kwangju Massacre
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- An editorial calling for probe into the truth behind the Kwangju massacre committed by the Chun Doo Hwan fascist junta was posted on the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Oct. 27 as regards the declassified information proving the U.S. connivance and involvement in the massacre.
					 The information reportedly contains the records that the U.S. special operation forces' MC-130 transport planes were to be deployed on May 25, 1980 when the Kwangju Popular Uprising was underway.
					
					 Citing the high possibility of U.S. forces' direct involvement in quelling the uprising, the editorial urged the U.S. to probe the truth behind it by declassifying relevant documents.

articles.title: U.S. Idea of "Limited Nuclear War" Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Idea of "Limited Nuclear War" Denounced
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. political circle and military discuss on "limited nuclear war".
					 The "limited nuclear war" is a form of small nuclear war based on the daydream of the U.S. to easily achieve its aggression goals after giving fatal blow to the opponent by use of tactical nuclear weapons in the limited areas.
					
					 It is a hysteric daydream that would cause catastrophic nuclear disaster in the planet, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article, adding:
					
					 The U.S. designated the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as the first target of "limited nuclear war".
					
					 As regards the U.S. test of tactical nuclear bomb "B61-12" in Nevada State in August last, analysts said that the Trump administration does not rule out the use of those tactical nukes to destroy munitions factories of the DPRK and weaken its combat capability.
					
					 The U.S. is going to make the Korean peninsula the first experimental field for verification of efficiency of its plan on "limited nuclear war" while branding the DPRK's steps for bolstering the nuclear force aimed to deter its nuclear war ambition as "worldwide threat". To this end, it has deployed huge nuclear strategic assets in and around the Korean peninsula, getting hell-bent on the reckless nuclear war drills and vociferating about "military option".
					
					 The DPRK is a world nuclear power equipped with powerful capability for preemptive nuclear strike and counterstrike. Tragic is the fact that the U.S. does not know that its plan on "limited nuclear war" for preemptive attack on the DPRK will be a self-destructive option hastening the final end of the empire of evil.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Praise Kim Jong Il's Party-building Feats
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Praise Kim Jong Il's Party-building Feats
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Newspaper of different countries dedicated articles to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday between Oct. 5 and 10.
					 The Indian paper Awaking said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an invincible party which wins only victory in implementing the socialist cause, the cause of independence.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The WPK, remarkably strengthened under the wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, is now making world-startling miracles and changes in implementing the popular masses' cause of independence as a powerful general staff of the revolution.
					
					 His party-building feats will go down in history.
					
					 The Indonesian online paper RMOL elaborated on the ideo-theoretical feats of Kim Jong Il who developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea into the guiding idea of the WPK.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al Misouri Alyaum and the Guinean paper Horoya introduced in detail the history of Kim Jong Il's guidance over the WPK.

articles.title: Seminars Held Abroad to Mark DPRK's Holidays
articles.content:
Seminars Held Abroad to Mark DPRK's Holidays
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Nepal, Sri Lanka, Indonesia, Mongolia and Russia from Sep. 29 to Oct. 21 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday and the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Extending warm congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un and all the Korean people on the 72nd founding anniversary of the WPK, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) said:
					
					 As the general staff of the revolution, the WPK had led the Korean people to victory under the leadership of the great President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The great leader Kim Jong Il further strengthened the WPK into the party of the leader.
					
					 Under the distinguished leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the WPK is creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as its steadfast guideline.
					
					 The chairman of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies said:
					
					 It would have been unthinkable without leadership of HE Kim Jong Il that the WPK could develop into an invincible party and always emerge victorious. He made epoch-making changes to be specially recorded in history by wisely leading the Korean people.
					
					 The first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and other speakers lauded the feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu for the founding and development of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la remodelada Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la remodelada Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigio en el terreno junto con Ri Sol Ju la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang, remodelada como prototipo y estandar de las plantas de ese tipo de nuestro pais.
					Luego de ver el mural de mosaico con la imagen respetuosa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Para ofrecer a nuestro pueblo mejores cosmeticos", recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial, nuevamente acondicionadas.
					
					Viendo atentamente una tras otra las fotos del Dirigente realizando una visita de orientacion sobre la fabrica en agosto del ano 2003, expreso que el se habria puesto muy contento si hubiera recorrido esta fabrica remodelada excelentemente.
					
					En todos los puntos de la fabrica, se puede percibir el amor por el pueblo del Dirigente que se ha esforzado mucho por facilitar a nuestro pueblo las condiciones de vida mas cultas, dijo y continuo que sin olvidar nunca las instrucciones de el dadas aquel dia de su visita, los funcionarios y empleados de la planta deben producir mucho mas cosmeticos de buena calidad y competitividad mundial para suministrarlos al pueblo.
					
					En su recorrido por la sala de mando de produccion integral, los talleres de cosmeticos, jabones y envases, la oficina de creacion de disenos, el instituto de cosmeticos, el centro de analisis de cosmeticos, la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas y la de muestras, el Maximo Dirigente se cercioro del estado de remodelacion, produccion e investigacion y de la calidad de los productos.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que fueran numericas y buenas las variedades y la calidad de los cosmeticos hechos en la fabrica y muy bonitos sus envases, apunto que ahora se hizo posible realizar el sueno de las mujeres que quieren ser mas hermosas. 
					
					Expreso en tono orgulloso que se siente muy complacido cuando piensa en las mujeres y los habitantes que se pondrian muy contentos por estos cosmeticos de nivel mundial que se producen en avalancha en esta fabrica modernizada, cientifizada e industrializada.
					
					Aqui estan claramente divididas las areas de produccion, educacion y vida, senalo y agrego que todas las construcciones se han hecho como las verdes y ahorradoras de energia.
					
					Cualquier parte ha sido remozada de modo irreconocible, dijo y continuo que le alegra mucho la remodelacion perfecta de la planta que no tendria defectos ni en el futuro remoto.
					
					Presento las tareas importantes que incumben a la fabrica y asigno en el terreno la tarea de modernizacion de los procesos productivos de la segunda etapa.
					
					Tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica expresando la esperanza y seguridad de que ellos daran la innovacion continua y el avance continuo en la tarea de ofrecer al pueblo los cosmeticos de buena calidad.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, An Jong Su, y los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, Kim Yo Jong y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: FDNA llama a la lucha por la nueva politica, nueva sociedad y nueva vida
articles.content:
FDNA llama a la lucha por la nueva politica, nueva sociedad y nueva vida
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- Segun el sitio Web Frente de Salvacion Nacional, el Comite Central del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista publico el dia 28 un llamamiento a toda la poblacion con motivo del primer aniversario de la sublevacion popular que dio sentencia a la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye. 
					Los habitantes de diferentes estratos del Sur de Corea se levantaron en la lucha con velas encendidas expresando gran indignacion por el inaudito escandalo de manipulacion chapucera de los "asuntos estatales" por la traidora Park Geun-hye, recuerda la nota y continua:
					
					Park Geun-hye y sus complices se enfrascaron en la "purga de comunistas" y libraron hasta el mitin de respuesta con velas para salir de la crisis irreparable, pero la lucha de la poblacion con velas encendidas logro encarcelar a la traidora Park y sentenciar el arruinamiento a la banda conservadora. 
					
					Gracias a la lucha con velas, fue sustituido el "poder" y pasaron ciento y decenas de dias despues de la aparicion del "poder" de reforma democratica. Pero, se queda todavia como sueno la aspiracion de la poblacion surcoreana a la nueva politica, nueva sociedad y nueva vida. 
					
					Si el nuevo "poder" surcoreano representara el criterio de la poblacion levantada en la lucha con velas, deberia exigir debidamente el cese de los ejercicios de guerra de agresion anti-Norte que acarrean el nubarron de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Pero, las actuales autoridades surcoreanas mendigan a EE.UU. el ofrecimiento del "disuasivo ampliado" y libran diariamente los ejercicios belicos conjuntos introduciendo las propiedades estrategicas nucleares norteamericanas. 
					
					Por culpa de ellas, se ven violados los frutos valiosos de la sublevacion popular con velas y se obstaculiza gravemente el desarrollo social, asi como se revitalizan los remanentes de la banda de Park Geun-hye y otras fuerzas conservadoras para dar marcha atras a la rueda de la historia. 
					
					Esta situacion llama de nuevo a la poblacion a la lucha con velas. 
					
					Todavia, no ha terminado, sino debe ser continuada la sublevacion popular con velas, esto es la unanime demanda de la poblacion. 
					
					No se debe tolerar a las autoridades surcoreanas que se entregan al servilismo pronorteamericano y el enfrentamiento fratricida y llevan a la crisis extremada las relaciones intercoreanas repitiendo el expediente criminal del "poder" conservador, pese a que tomaron el poder gracias a la lucha con velas. 
					
					Al margen de la reunificacion de la patria no se puede pensar en la nueva politica, nueva sociedad y nueva vida, deseadas por la poblacion levantada en la lucha con velas.
					
					Es pequena una vela encendida, pero son grandes y potentes miles y miles de velas.
					
					La victoria de la sublevacion con velas es de la poblacion surcoreana que sigue marchando hacia la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion con el temperamento de haber sepultado a la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					
					Todos los habitantes surcoreanos deben levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha con velas para lograr sin falta la nueva politica, nueva sociedad y nueva vida.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la competencia otonal de aficionados a maraton de 2017
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la competencia otonal de aficionados a maraton de 2017
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en esta capital la competencia otonal de los aficionados a maraton de 2017.
					En esta cita deportiva participaron los aficionados a maraton de Corea, Holanda, Suecia, Checo, Gran Bretana y otros paises.
					
					Las competencias se entablaron divididas en el maraton, semi-maraton y las carreras de 10 km y 5 km.
					
					Mas de 240 maratonistas de ambos sexos corrieron la pista y les dieron animo en las calles los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos. 
					
					Fueron otorgados los certificados de participacion y los objetos de recuerdo a los jugadores sobresalientes.
